fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Target a player. They will learn they were picked by an Elitist.
 - The following night, if you pick them again, they will be Framed, super roleblocked, and all attacks from the feudal faction against the player are guaranteed to kill the player permanently.
- If an Elitist is the final member of the Feudal Faction that is alive, everybody is notified of their existence
